attr.title: Brad Has A Pain
attr.desc: Brad's sole goal is to stop Lisa from spreading her evil across Olathe at any and all costs. The only problem is... Brad has a pain..
attr.desc_md: Brad's sole goal is to stop Lisa from spreading her evil across Olathe at any and all costs. The only problem is... Brad has a pain.
attr.inst: Download the game on Itch 'https://scary-lemon.itch.io/brad-has-a-pain' download BraHasPain.rar and extract contents of BradHasPain folder to Gamedata folder
